mapper.select: SELECT * FROM projectSummary where (deltag <> '1' or deltag is null) order by createTime asc

select a.id, a.projectNum, a.projectName, a.designPhase, a.principalId, b.username principal, a.chiefEngineerId, c.username chiefEngineer, a.startTime, a.stopTime, a.leftTime, a.deltag, a.createTime, a.updateTime from projectSummary a, user b, user c where a.principalId = b.id and a.chiefEngineerId = c.id and (a.deltag <> '1' or a.deltag is null) and (b.deltag <> '1' or b.deltag is null) and (c.deltag <> '1' or c.deltag is null) and a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projectSummary(projectNum, projectName, designPhase, principalId, principal, chiefEngineerId, chiefEngineer, startTime, stopTime, leftTime, createTime, updateTime, deltag) VALUES (#{projectNum}, #{projectName}, #{designPhase}, #{principalId}, #{principal}, #{chiefEngineerId}, #{chiefEngineer}, #{startTime}, #{stopTime}, #{leftTime}, now(), now(), #{deltag})
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.projectNum, t1.projectName, t1.designPhase, t1.principalId, t1.chiefEngineerId, t2.username as principal, t3.username chiefEngineer, t1.startTime, t1.stopTime, t1.leftTime, t1.createTime, t1.updateTime, t1.deltag from ( select * from projectSummary where id in ( select projectSummaryId from project where principalId = (select id from user where cardId = #{username}) or chiefEngineerId = (select id from user where cardId = #{username}) ) or principalId = (select id from user where cardId = #{username}) or chiefEngineerId = (select id from user where cardId = #{username}) ) t1 left join (select * from user) t2 on t1.principalId = t2.id left join (select * from user) t3 on t1.chiefEngineerId = t3.id order by t1.id asc
